seo.title: Cinque Terre Hiking Trails 2025 | Sentiero Azzurro & Best Routes
seo.description: Complete guide to hiking trails in Cinque Terre. Discover Sentiero Azzurro, coastal paths, difficulty levels, opening times, and stunning Mediterranean views.

body.title: Legendary Coastal Trails
body.subtitle: Explore the famous Sentiero Azzurro and scenic paths connecting five villages with breathtaking Mediterranean views

features.title: Sentiero Azzurro (Blue Path)
features.description: The classic coastal trail connecting all five villages, offering spectacular sea views and authentic village experiences

features.title: Via dell'Amore
features.description: The romantic lovers' path from Riomaggiore to Manarola, an easy 1km walk with stunning clifftop panoramas

features.title: Monterosso to Vernazza
features.description: Moderate 3.5km trail through vineyards and Mediterranean vegetation with rewarding coastal vistas

features.title: High Path (Sentiero Rosso)
features.description: Advanced ridge trail offering panoramic views of the entire coastline and Ligurian Alps

features.title: Sanctuary Trails
features.description: Steep paths leading to hilltop sanctuaries above each village, combining spiritual heritage with views

features.title: Trail Cards & Permits
features.description: Cinque Terre Card required for main trails, includes train access and trail maintenance support

body.title: Plan Your Hiking Adventure
body.description: Check trail conditions, get detailed maps, and discover the best routes for your visit
